attributes.action: Scrap 4 x 4 tax in farming post code areas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These areas NEED 4x4 vehicles to operate daily life.  These are NOT CHELSEA TRACTORS but essential pieces of equipment. If climate change is upon us we shall all need them soon!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
